event.description: Ichiro Suzuki grounds out, shortstop Brendan Harris to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Jose Lopez strikes out swinging.
Mike Sweeney flies out to right fielder Michael Cuddyer.
Adrian Beltre grounds out, shortstop Brendan Harris to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Wladimir Balentien strikes out swinging.
Russell Branyan grounds out, second baseman Matt Tolbert to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Kenji Johjima flies out to right fielder Michael Cuddyer.
Franklin Gutierrez pops out to shortstop Brendan Harris.
Yuniesky Betancourt grounds out, shortstop Brendan Harris to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Ichiro Suzuki hit by pitch.
Jose Lopez flies out to center fielder Denard Span.
Mike Sweeney homers (2) on a fly ball to left center field. Ichiro Suzuki scores.
Adrian Beltre singles on a ground ball to center fielder Denard Span.
With Wladimir Balentien batting, Adrian Beltre steals (5) 2nd base.
Wladimir Balentien strikes out swinging.
Russell Branyan walks.
Kenji Johjima singles on a ground ball to left fielder Delmon Young. Adrian Beltre scores. Russell Branyan to 2nd.
Franklin Gutierrez walks. Russell Branyan to 3rd. Kenji Johjima to 2nd.
Yuniesky Betancourt pops out to shortstop Brendan Harris.
Ichiro Suzuki singles on a ground ball to shortstop Brendan Harris.
Jose Lopez doubles (5) on a line drive to left fielder Delmon Young. Ichiro Suzuki scores.
Mike Sweeney called out on strikes.
Adrian Beltre doubles (9) on a line drive to center fielder Denard Span. Jose Lopez scores.
With Wladimir Balentien batting, Adrian Beltre caught stealing 3rd base, catcher Joe Mauer to third baseman Brian Buscher.
Wladimir Balentien grounds out, shortstop Brendan Harris to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Pitching Change: Luis Ayala replaces Francisco Liriano.
Russell Branyan singles on a line drive to right fielder Michael Cuddyer.
Kenji Johjima grounds out softly, third baseman Brian Buscher to first baseman Justin Morneau. Russell Branyan to 2nd.
Franklin Gutierrez walks.
Yuniesky Betancourt grounds into a double play, shortstop Brendan Harris to second baseman Matt Tolbert to first baseman Justin Morneau. Franklin Gutierrez out at 2nd.
Ichiro Suzuki flies out to right fielder Michael Cuddyer.
Jose Lopez pops out to third baseman Brian Buscher in foul territory.
Mike Sweeney strikes out swinging.
Defensive switch from center field to left field for Denard Span.
Defensive Substitution: Carlos Gomez replaces left fielder Delmon Young, batting 8th, playing center field.
Pitching Change: Matt Guerrier replaces Luis Ayala.
Adrian Beltre homers (1) on a fly ball to left field.
Wladimir Balentien grounds out, shortstop Brendan Harris to first baseman Justin Morneau.
Russell Branyan called out on strikes.
Kenji Johjima singles on a ground ball to third baseman Brian Buscher.
Franklin Gutierrez flies out to center fielder Carlos Gomez.
Pitching Change: Joe Nathan replaces Matt Guerrier.
Yuniesky Betancourt pops out to second baseman Matt Tolbert.
Ichiro Suzuki singles on a line drive to center fielder Carlos Gomez.
Jose Lopez grounds into a double play, third baseman Brian Buscher to second baseman Matt Tolbert to first baseman Justin Morneau. Ichiro Suzuki out at 2nd.
Denard Span doubles (4) on a fly ball to left fielder Wladimir Balentien.
Matt Tolbert walks.
With Joe Mauer batting, wild pitch by Felix Hernandez, Denard Span to 3rd. Matt Tolbert to 2nd.
Joe Mauer doubles (3) on a ground ball to right fielder Ichiro Suzuki. Denard Span scores. Matt Tolbert scores.
Justin Morneau walks.
Jason Kubel grounds into a double play, third baseman Adrian Beltre to second baseman Jose Lopez to first baseman Russell Branyan. Joe Mauer to 3rd. Justin Morneau out at 2nd.
Michael Cuddyer grounds out, third baseman Adrian Beltre to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Brian Buscher called out on strikes.
Delmon Young grounds out, pitcher Felix Hernandez to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Brendan Harris grounds out, second baseman Jose Lopez to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Denard Span walks.
With Matt Tolbert batting, Denard Span caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Kenji Johjima to shortstop Yuniesky Betancourt.
Matt Tolbert strikes out on a foul tip.
Joe Mauer homers (3) on a fly ball to left center field.
Justin Morneau homers (8) on a fly ball to right field.
Jason Kubel flies out to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez.
Michael Cuddyer singles on a ground ball to right fielder Ichiro Suzuki.
Brian Buscher singles on a line drive to left fielder Wladimir Balentien. Michael Cuddyer to 2nd.
Delmon Young flies out to center fielder Franklin Gutierrez. Michael Cuddyer to 3rd.

Brendan Harris reaches on a fielder's choice, fielded by third baseman Adrian Beltre. Michael Cuddyer scores. Brian Buscher to 3rd. Brendan Harris to 2nd. Throwing error by third baseman Adrian Beltre.
Denard Span out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Wladimir Balentien. Brian Buscher scores.
Matt Tolbert grounds out, shortstop Yuniesky Betancourt to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Pitching Change: Sean White replaces Felix Hernandez.
Joe Mauer walks.
Justin Morneau singles on a ground ball to left fielder Wladimir Balentien. Joe Mauer to 2nd.
Jason Kubel strikes out swinging.
Michael Cuddyer homers (3) on a fly ball to left field. Joe Mauer scores. Justin Morneau scores.
Brian Buscher grounds out, first baseman Russell Branyan to pitcher Sean White.
Delmon Young grounds out softly, third baseman Adrian Beltre to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Pitching Change: Denny Stark replaces Sean White.
Brendan Harris reaches on a fielding error by third baseman Adrian Beltre.
Denard Span pops out to third baseman Adrian Beltre.
Matt Tolbert strikes out swinging.
Joe Mauer walks. Brendan Harris to 2nd.
Justin Morneau walks. Brendan Harris to 3rd. Joe Mauer to 2nd.
Jason Kubel grounds out, second baseman Jose Lopez to first baseman Russell Branyan.
Pitching Change: David Aardsma replaces Denny Stark.
Michael Cuddyer strikes out swinging.
Brian Buscher walks.
Delmon Young strikes out swinging.
Brendan Harris called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Miguel Batista replaces David Aardsma.
Denard Span called out on strikes.
Matt Tolbert strikes out swinging.
Joe Mauer flies out to left fielder Wladimir Balentien.
